objects.text:
Deep moisturizing formula for silky hair
Advanced damage repair technology
Anti-frizz protection for manageable hair
Intense nourishment for dry hair

product_details.name: Ela De Pure Luxury Moisturizing Shampoo - Premium Hair Hydration Solution
product_details.description:
• Deep moisturizing formula for silky-smooth hair
• Advanced damage repair technology
• Anti-frizz protection for manageable hair
• Intense nourishment for dry and damaged hair
• Professional-grade hair care solution
• Generous 280ml/9.5fl.oz size
• Elegant and convenient pump dispenser
• Minimalist, premium packaging design
• Salon-quality formulation for daily use
• Perfect for all hair types seeking hydration

banner_details:
This banner promotes a premium shampoo product with a sophisticated and minimalistic aesthetic. It features a clean, soft beige background framed by fine stroke lines and elegant decorative curves at the edges. The heading layer (`heading`) uses a bold serif font in charcoal to emphasize luxury, while the subheading (`subheading`) is styled in a muted brown serif font, complementing the overall classy tone. The central text block (`description`) provides product benefits in a neat, left-aligned arrangement using a modern sans-serif. Branding elements (`brand_name`, `product_name`) follow a similar clean and elegant format. A large price display (`price`) in bold black ensures visibility, alongside a brown call-to-action banner (`cta_background`) with contrasting white text (`cta`). A shampoo bottle image (`product_image`) sits to the right, anchoring the layout visually. The tagline (`tagline`) subtly reiterates product positioning at the bottom.

**Color Palette:**
- Cream white (#F6F2EE)
- Charcoal black (#2A2A2A)
- Earthy brown (#846F5B)
- Pure white (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a minimalist and elegant color palette ideal for a luxury hair care brand. The dominant color is an off-white beige (#F6F2EB) used for the bottle, creating a soft and organic feel. Black (#000000) is used prominently in the text and pump, offering strong contrast and clarity. A subtle touch of ivory (#FAF9F6) blends the background seamlessly with the bottle, maintaining a clean aesthetic. The sleek contrast of off-white and black makes key text and features stand out while maintaining a premium, natural tone. This palette can be used effectively in banner designs for a high-end, organic feel.
